name: nestjs-demo-app--parent
description: Parent package for both the NestJS demo app. This is a set convenience scripts for running the app from the project root directory.
author: Wristband

scripts.clean: rm -rf vue-frontend/dist/; rm -rf backend/dist/; rm -rf backend/static/
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix vue-frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.setup: npm run clean; npm install; npm install --prefix vue-frontend; npm install --prefix backend; npm run build
